description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand.
flavorText: "As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'" - Saga of the First Lands
name: Zephyr Sage
